name: Invernantira
culture_notes: coastal-Highland mixed dialect (Coastal Tongues + Highland Cant)
winter festivals honoring ancestors and tides
salt-preserved cuisine; fish and kelp staples
ritual observances tied to seamanship and seasonal ice
constraints: no instant resurrection or life-replacement magics
long-range mind influence rare and institutionally banned
ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
notes: navigational auguries exist but do not replace charts and seamanship
combustion-derived industry minimal; local craft and ritual labor dominate
